column3:
Woah there dear, that was pretty rude! They petrified themselves with my blessing!
*Please remember to respect statues who volunteered for charity, my priest! Only they themselves can free themselves from the fate they have been bestowed. If you have a complaint, please submit it to the Pyralis Municipal Courts.*
> Take a step back, and go think about your actions in the corner my sugar plum. {user.display_name} made their own call to become a statue, and may call upon me again to be freed. Priests are not allowed to interfere!
